articles.author: Karishma Hasnat
articles.title: ‘Northeast believes in Modi’s guarantee’ — PM announces big projects in Assam, no mention of Manipur - ThePrint
articles.description: Addressing large crowd in Guwahati, he announced development projects worth Rs 11,600-cr to 'boost connectivity in Assam & Northeast as well as with neighbouring South Asian countries'.
articles.content: Since 3 May, Manipur has been embroiled in deadly clashes between the tribal Kuki community and the non-tribal Meiteis. At least 200 people have died, and tens of thousands displaced. Many fear they … [+4742 chars]
